title: Katherine and Reggie get creative
description: Reggie gets artistic as he photographs Katherine and Clara on the Galaxy Note 20.

text: Turn on your out of office and learn to serve. Reggie Yates gets artistic as he uses the Galaxy Note 20 to photograph Clara Amfo, Katherine Ryan and her side-kick pooch at Samsung KX.

Samsung KXâ€™s all new series Lunch & Listen is here to help you reclaim your lunch break! Hosted by Clara Amfo, this fun and engaging two-part series sees special guests Katherine Ryan, Munya Chawawa, Reggie Yates and Amelia Dimoldenberg reveal their hidden hobbies and talk about how they reclaim their free time -  inspiring you to do the same.
